DOC.brief_summary: Aim study compare 6 month follow-up , endothelization malapposition , evaluate mean optical coherence tomography , term number strut endothelized malapposed , implantation three new generation stent : Cre8 , Biomatrix Xience .
DOC.brief_title: 6-month Intracoronary Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) Evaluation Three New Generation Drug Eluting Stent
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study aim evaluate 60 patient either acute coronary syndrome stable coronary artery disease submit PCI stenting , endothelization malapposition 6 month follow-up ( primary endpoint ) , evaluate mean optical coherence tomography term number strut re-endothelized malapposed , implantation three new generation stent : Cre8 , Biomatrix Xience . Further clinical follow-up perform evaluate MACE 12 month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Patients stable angina acute coronary syndrome submit coronary angioplasty coronary vessel diameter > 2,5 mm Known allergy antithrombotic drug component stent study Planned surgery 6 month within angioplasty
